    • Method Detail

      • bootstrapInternalLogging

        void bootstrapInternalLogging()
        Configure a logger for bootstrap purposes. No external settings are available at this point

      • bootstrapInternalLogging

        void bootstrapInternalLogging(String loggingLevelString)
        Configure a logger for bootstrap purposes. No external settings are available at this point
        Parameters:
        loggingLevelString - Log level as a string - Logging implementation specific

      • bootstrapInternalLogging

        void bootstrapInternalLogging(String loggerName,
                            String loggingLevelString)
        Configure a logger for bootstrap purposes. No external settings are available at this point
        Parameters:
        loggerName - Name of logger to bootstrap
        loggingLevelString - Log level as a string - Logging implementation specific

      • quietLoggingInitializationMessages

        void quietLoggingInitializationMessages(List<String> loggerNames)
        Quieten the loggers associated with a list of package names. Defaults to ERROR level if logLevelString is not specified
        Parameters:
        loggerNames - List of logger names (as strings)

      • quietLoggingInitializationMessages

        void quietLoggingInitializationMessages(List<String> loggerNames,
                                      String logLevelString)
        Quieten the loggers associated with a list of logger names. Defaults to ERROR level if logLevelString is not specified
        Parameters:
        loggerNames - List of logger names (as strings)
        logLevelString - Log level as a string to set logger to. Defaults to "ERROR".

      • quietLoggingInitializationMessages

        void quietLoggingInitializationMessages(String loggerName)
        Quieten the loggers associated with a logger names. Defaults to ERROR level if logLevelString is not specified
        Parameters:
        loggerName - Package name (as strings)

      • quietLoggingInitializationMessages

        void quietLoggingInitializationMessages(String loggerName,
                                      String logLevelString)
        Quieten the loggers associated with a logger name. Defaults to ERROR level if logLevelString is not specified
        Parameters:
        loggerName - Logger name (as strings)
        logLevelString - Log level as a string to set logger to. Defaults to "ERROR".

      • configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile

        void configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile(String loggingConfigurationFileName,
                                        String loggingLevel)
        Create a logger from the specified configuration file name with the specified logging level as an override
        Parameters:
        loggingConfigurationFileName -
        loggingLevel -

      • configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile

        void configureLoggerFromConfigurationFile(String loggingConfigurationFileName,
                                        String loggingLevel,
                                        org.slf4j.Logger activeLogger)
        Create a logger from the specified configuration file name with the specified logging level as an override. Use the specified logger to log any error messages
        Parameters:
        loggingConfigurationFileName -
        loggingLevel -
        activeLogger - logger to use for logging until logging is configured for the specified logger. Null indicates no override

      • overrideLogLevel

        void overrideLogLevel(String loggerName,
                    String loggingLevel)
        Override logging level for specified logger
        Parameters:
        loggerName - Name of logger
        loggingLevel - Logging level
